channel.title: Home on Ev's Personal Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Ev's Personal Blog

item.title: Who else is afraid of pointers?
item.description: When I started college, in the far away year of 2005 (wow, time flies), I had little to no experience in software development. To not say I knew absolutely nothing about it, during high school I took a training course with a friend on Microsoft Office tools and learned a little bit of basic boolean logic (if/elses), despite not really knowing what that meant, for writing Excel formulas or simple (granted, copy-pasted) macros in Visual Basic.
